generated_caption: This statistic shows the value of total merchandise exports from Czechia to Russia from 2010 to 2019 . In 2019 , the export value of goods from Czechia to Russia amounted to approximately 4.3 billion U.S. dollars .

The second most popular platform was the State Educational Resource Center ( SEDOC ) with 13 percent of universities using it .

In 2020 , rock was the most popular genre among male respondents in Russia . Pop songs were the most popular genre among female respondents .

The share of enterprises expecting negative effects was highest among those operating in the transportation , warehousing , postal services , and telecommunication sectors .

The Consumer Confidence Index ( CCI ) is an economic indicator that measures the general mood of consumers . It is based on a survey asking respondents about their financial situation , their attitude towards the economy , and their expectations for the future . The survey results are then compiled into an index , which can range from -200 to 200 . A positive number indicates a positive consumer confidence , while a negative number shows a negative consumer confidence . In February 2022 , the CCI in Poland decreased by 32.8 points compared to the previous month .

This statistic presents the leading social networks in the United States as of October 2018 , ranked by monthly active users . During the measured period , Facebook was the most popular social network with 206 million monthly active users . Instagram ranked second with 157 million monthly active users .
